hibernate-mapping.query: select new FormatDefinition( fd.Id, fd.FormatId, fd.PortionCode, fd.Position, fd.Length, fd.MaximumValue, fd.Prefix, fd.Suffix, fd.IsValue, fd.IsCheckDigit, fd.IsIncrement, fd.IsZeroLeading, fd.Active, fd.TS, fd.CreatedDate, fd.CreatedUserId, fd.UpdatedDate, fd.UpdatedUserId ) from FormatDefinition as fd inner join fd.Format as f where f.Code =:code and fd.Active=true

select new FormatDefinition( fd.Id, fd.FormatId, fd.PortionCode, fd.Position, fd.Length, fd.MaximumValue, fd.Prefix, fd.Suffix, fd.IsValue, fd.IsCheckDigit, fd.IsIncrement, fd.IsZeroLeading, fd.Active, fd.TS, fd.CreatedDate, fd.CreatedUserId, fd.UpdatedDate, fd.UpdatedUserId ) from FormatDefinition as fd inner join fd.Format as f where f.Code =:code and fd.BranchCode =: branchCode and fd.Active=true and f.Active = true order by fd.Position
update FormatDefinition fd set fd.MaximumValue = :maximumValue, fd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, fd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where fd.Id = :id and fd.TS = :ts

update FormatDefinition fd set fd.MaximumValue = :maximumValue, fd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, fd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where fd.Id = :id and fd.TS = :ts and fd.BranchCode =: branchCode and fd.Active = true

select distinct new formatDefinitiondto( fd.FormatId, f.Code, f.Description, fd.PortionCode, fd.Position, fd.Length, fd.Prefix, fd.Suffix, fd.IsValue, fd.IsCheckDigit, fd.IsIncrement, fd.IsIncrementByDay, fd.IsZeroLeading, fd.Active ) from FormatDefinition as fd inner join fd.Format as f where fd.Active = true Order By fd.FormatId,fd.Position
select distinct new formatDefinitiondto( f.FormatId, f.PortionCode) from FormatDefinition as f where ( f.FormatId =: formatId and f.PortionCode =: portionCode) and f.Active = true
select new formatDefinitiondto( Max(f.Id) ) from FormatDefinition as f

update FormatDefinition fd set fd.MaximumValue = 0, fd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, fd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where fd.BranchCode = :branchCode and fd.Active = true and fd.IsIncrementByDay = true

update FormatDefinition fd set fd.MaximumValue = 0, fd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, fd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where fd.BranchCode =: branchCode and fd.Active = true and FormatId not in (select id from Format where CodeFormat ='15' or Code='CustomerNoCodeFormula')

update FormatDefinition fd set fd.MaximumValue = :maximumValue, fd.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, fd.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where fd.FormatId = :formatid
and fd.BranchCode =: branchCode and fd.Active = true
